analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol:
	Contract EthTranchePricing has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#513-528):
	External calls:
	- finalizeAgent.finalizeCrowdsale() (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#525-527)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- finalized (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#527)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#361-413):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#369-383)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#383-387)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#402-405)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#401)
SafeMathLib.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#65-76) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#311-350):
	External calls:
	- setPricingStrategy(_pricingStrategy) (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#328-332)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#361-413):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#369-383)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#383-387)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#428-447):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#430-433)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investedAmountOf (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#439-441)
	- tokenAmountOf (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#441-442)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#668-698) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#683-698)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#682-698)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#216-218)
ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#174)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/30/0x7bbc3ad5c296ae6eb50228d2a6a37234d2db3ff1.sol#200)
